title: Uzume
summary: A playful primordial who kindles first light and unsettles tyrants with mirth.

title: Kaos
summary: The raw gulf before creation—whispered by sages as the hunger between stars.

title: Kronos
summary: Time’s architect, who wound the first hourglass and learned to fear its sand.

title: Aeternia
summary: Imperial heartland of scholars and marble law, now fissured by quiet wars.

title: Nav’golam
summary: Port of a thousand lanterns; its docks remember every storm by name.

title: Skazka
summary: A dark fantasy world which forms the setting for a Dungeons & Dragons campaign.

title: The Veil
summary: The boundary between worlds and dimensions. In some places on Skazka this veil is thin and post dimensional travel is relatively easy.

title: The Shadow War
summary: A devastating intra guild war which took place between 381 - 391 which resulted in defeat for those who supported Ilistran Darkweaver and his ultimate disappearance.
